snippet.title: Sea of Survivors - Alpha Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The Official Trailer for the upcoming pirate horde survival game, Sea of Survivors. Coming 2023.

Wishlist Sea of Survivors on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2347940/Sea_of_Survivors/
Join the Discord Crew:
https://discord.gg/d3AvRGP3P3

 You can sail in any direction but you can’t stop moving as you dodge and destroy hordes of pirates and sea monsters to gain experience, level up and upgrade your ship with powerful weapons and abilities. Discover mysterious curses, and unlock unique treasures as you fight for your survival.
